hero.title: DESIGN AND ARCHITECTURE STUDIO
hero.description: We create architecture and interiors that inspire and make life more comfortable

about.title: About Us
about.description1: We are an architectural studio where creativity and functionality merge to create spaces that inspire and transform everyday life.
about.description2: We focus on developing solutions for residential and commercial properties that are not only aesthetically appealing but also practical. Our team of professionals strives for excellence in every project.
about.description3: Each project is a unique journey that begins with understanding your needs and ends with creating a space that exceeds your expectations.

creativePath.title: Creative Journey
creativePath.name: Dmitry Arkadyevich Kefhayants
creativePath.description1: I was born in 1988 in Tashkent. I graduated from school in 2005 and enrolled in TASI at the Faculty of Architectural Environment Design. I completed my studies in 2009 with one of the highest scores.
creativePath.description2: In 2008, I won first place at the International Architectural Competition MACCA - 1st place (diploma), Minsk, Belarus.
creativePath.description3: In August 2009, I received 1st place at the Uzbekistan Architects Guild Competition (diploma), Tashkent.
creativePath.description4: In January 2010, I became a laureate of the 'Forum Fund' award and took 1st place at the Festival of Traditional and Contemporary Art 'Navkiron Uzbekistan' (diploma), Tashkent, Uzbekistan.
creativePath.description5: I received my first job and project in 2009 at the age of 21. Since then, I have been exclusively engaged in architecture and design, working with various large companies.
creativePath.description6: November 2009 - September 2010: Joint Venture LLC 'Neftegazsanoatloyiha', Tashkent, Uzbekistan. Position – Designer.
creativePath.description7: March 2012 - August 2013: LLC 'TRDM', 'Federation Tower, Moscow City', Moscow, Russia. Position – Architect-Designer.
creativePath.description8: March 2014 - September 2014: Joint Venture LLC 'GLOBAL', Almaty, Kazakhstan. Position – Architect.
creativePath.description9: January 2015 - March 2017: LLC 'Uzkoprikloyiha', Tashkent, Uzbekistan. Position – Chief Project Engineer.
creativePath.description10: June 2017 - September 2019: Architectural Company LLC 'Niiat', Tashkent, Uzbekistan. Position – Chief Architect.
creativePath.description11: 2019 - 2021: LLC 'Epsilon Development Company', Tashkent/Kashkadarya Region. Position – Head of Architectural-Construction Group / Chief Project Engineer.
creativePath.description12: 2022: 'Enter Engineering' Company, Head of Civil Construction and VZiSOV.
creativePath.description13: 2023 - present: Chief Architect at LLC 'Niiat', Tashkent, Uzbekistan. In 2023, I founded my own architecture and design studio 'MARS architects', which is actively developing in all directions.

projects.title: Architectural Projects
projects.description: We create architecture that harmoniously combines aesthetics, functionality, and innovative technologies. Our studio’s portfolio includes unique projects for residential, commercial, and public spaces, designed with modern trends and our clients’ individual needs in mind.

items.name: Modern Residential Complex
items.short_description: Modern residential complex with sustainable design.
items.description:
This project incorporates innovative architectural solutions.
It prioritizes eco-friendly materials and energy efficiency.

items.name: Commercial Hub
items.description:
Designed for functionality and aesthetics.
Includes modern technologies for smart operations.

items.title: Innovative Architectural Trends
items.description: An article exploring the latest trends in sustainable architecture.

items.title: Design of the Future
items.description: An article about our studio’s approach to modern design.

design.title: Interior Design
design.description: We create interiors that reflect our clients’ style, character, and lifestyle. In our work, we combine aesthetics, functionality, and modern technologies to ensure each project is unique and comfortable.

items.name: Luxurious Apartment
items.description:
Sophisticated interior design for a modern apartment.
Uses high-quality materials and smart home technologies.

items.name: Cozy Villa
items.description:
Warm and inviting villa interior.
Designed for comfort and elegance.

contacts.title: Contact Us
contacts.description: Have questions? Want to learn more about our services? Write to us using the form below, and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
